name: ListMessage
description: Retrieve a list of Message resources associated with a Twilio Account

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) associated with the Message resources.

To.description: Filter by recipient. For example: Set this `to` parameter to `+15558881111` to retrieve a list of Message resources with `to` properties of `+15558881111`

From.description: Filter by sender. For example: Set this `from` parameter to `+15552229999` to retrieve a list of Message resources with `from` properties of `+15552229999`

DateSent.description: Filter by Message `sent_date`. Accepts GMT dates in the following formats: `YYYY-MM-DD` (to find Messages with a specific `sent_date`), `<=YYYY-MM-DD` (to find Messages with `sent_date`s on and before a specific date), and `>=YYYY-MM-DD` (to find Messages with `sent_dates` on and after a specific date).

DateSent<.description: Filter by Message `sent_date`. Accepts GMT dates in the following formats: `YYYY-MM-DD` (to find Messages with a specific `sent_date`), `<=YYYY-MM-DD` (to find Messages with `sent_date`s on and before a specific date), and `>=YYYY-MM-DD` (to find Messages with `sent_dates` on and after a specific date).

DateSent>.description: Filter by Message `sent_date`. Accepts GMT dates in the following formats: `YYYY-MM-DD` (to find Messages with a specific `sent_date`), `<=YYYY-MM-DD` (to find Messages with `sent_date`s on and before a specific date), and `>=YYYY-MM-DD` (to find Messages with `sent_dates` on and after a specific date).

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
